My story

Let me tell you a few things about me...

BIO

I am a hardworking and persistent person who is looking for a decent job to realize my own ideas and improve my skills. I have good knowledge in such technical skills: HTML, CSS, Javascript, React, Node.js(basic), Webpack and Git. I also have an interest in design and intend to develop in this direction. I am a responsible, persistent and creative person, able to defend my point of view and can adapt to any working conditions and to any team I am also always open to new knowledge and new acquaintances
